code: import React from'react';import{composeWithDevTools}from'remote-redux-devtools';import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{Provider}from'react-redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import promise from'redux-promise';import createLogger from'redux-logger';import WeatherApp from"./MainScreen";import searchReducer from"../reducers/search";var logger=createLogger();var store=createStore(searchReducer,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(thunk,promise,logger)));var Main=function Main(){return React.createElement(Provider,{store:store},React.createElement(WeatherApp,null));};export default Main;
